text: Oostmalle Airfield is an airport in the Antwerp province of the Flemish Region of Belgium. It is east of the town of Zoersel, south of the town of Oostmalle, and west of the town of Wechelderzande, in the municipality of Malle. == Related pages == * List of airports in Belgium ==References== ==Other websites== * Zoersel - Oostmalle (EBZR) * * Aero Para Club der Kempen (Dutch) * Zweefvliegen Zoersel-Oostmalle Belgie (Dutch language) Category:Airports in Belgium Category:1955 establishments in Europe Category:1950s establishments in Belgium
title: Oostmalle Airfield
